title: Kingdom of Heaven: Massive Cavalry Battle - Rise and Fall - Mount & Blade: Warband Mod Gameplay
description:
Kingdom of Heaven: Massive Cavalry Battle - Rise and Fall - Mount & Blade: Warband Mod Gameplay - Welcome back to Call to Arms!  Today we have a custom battle on a mod called Rise and Fall for Mount & Blade: Warband.  This is a 200 man Cavalry only battle.  We were trying to recreate the Cavalry battle from the Kingdom of Heaven movie.  In the First 2 rounds the Knights of Apollo fight as the Crusaders.  And Then we switch to the Saracens.  Enjoy the Battle :D

Oasis Hosting Discount Code: https://oasis-hosting.net/gameservers/mbwb/?discountCode=pa2017

Lionheart's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10

Call to Arms Info:
LEARN MORE ABOUT CALL TO ARMS - 
Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559
Call to Arms Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/calltoarmsmountandblade


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
